header.title: Advanced document text search
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies text search in popular document formats, allowing you to create powerful search queries in your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful library designed for full-text search and indexing in documents. It supports over 70 file formats, including PDF, Word, PowerPoint, Excel, images, and ZIP files, ensuring fast and accurate search results.

more_features.title: Advanced search and indexing features
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances text search and indexing across more than 70 file formats, providing efficient tools for locating and managing information.

feature_1.title: Powerful text search
feature_1.content: Search for text across multiple document types, including PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, and spreadsheets. Use features like exact matches, fuzzy search, and wildcards to refine your results.

feature_2.title: Fast indexing for large data sets
feature_2.content: Create and manage search indexes for quick retrieval of information. Indexing optimizes searches across extensive document collections.

feature_3.title: Multi-language support
feature_3.content: Perform searches in over 80 languages, with support for different keyboard layouts and word variations to improve accuracy.

feature_4.title: Customizable search settings
feature_4.content: Fine-tune search parameters with options like case sensitivity, date range filters, and word exclusions for better results.

formats.title: Search across your business documents
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports more than 70 file formats, including office documents, enabling quick and efficient searches with indexing capabilities.

operations.title: Explore key features
operations.description: Take advantage of advanced and high-performance search functionalities.
